short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Providing secret insights about creators' activity on Bitclout.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BitClout is a new social media platform where users can buy "creator coins" that are tied to certain celebrities.
The API behind the website is made in such a way that you do not need to be authenticated to retrieve your private messages. Only the content of the messages is encrypted but everyone can see the number of messages sent and received by each person.
CloutSpy is designed to retrieve these informations automatically!
CloutSpy can now track transactions, notifications and wallets too!
